snippet: Israeli forces stationed along the border with Gaza fatally shot one Palestinian man and wounded another on Thursday, according to a Palestinian official.
abstract: Israeli forces stationed along border with Gaza fatally shoot one Palestinian man and wound another.
lead_paragraph: Israeli forces stationed along the border with Gaza fatally shot one Palestinian man and wounded another on Thursday, according to a Palestinian official.

headline.main: Israeli Forces Kill Palestinian at Gaza Border
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Palestinian Killed by Israeli Forces
